detail_desc: Trousers in soft, narrow-wale cotton corduroy with adjustable elastication and a drawstring at the waist and a fake fly with decorative buttons. Jersey lining.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric made from an organic cotton blend with a hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Top in woven fabric with a lace trim at the top, V-neck front and back and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps.
Jumper in fine-knit cotton with buttons on one shoulder, long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Aqua shoes in scuba fabric with elastication around the top, a loop at the back and textured soles.
5-pocket shorts in washed, stretch cotton denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button and slim legs that finish just above the knees. The cotton content of the shorts is partly recycled.
Metal earrings in the shape of a face. Length 5 cm.
Long-sleeved tops in soft cotton jersey with a gathered frill around the neckline and cuffs.
Straight-cut, single-breasted jacket in a lightly brushed weave. Slightly longer style with narrow notch lapels, thin shoulder pads, and flap front pockets. Lined.
Gilet in soft faux fur with a concealed button at the top. Lined.
V-neck blouse in a crinkled weave with a sheen. Wrapover front with covered buttons at one side and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Unlined.
Blouse woven in a Tencel™ lyocell blend with an opening and button at the back of the neck and short, frilled sleeves.
Cropped vest top in soft cotton jersey.
Slingbacks in imitation suede with pointed toes, satin linings and imitation leather insoles.
Top in soft cotton jersey with a yoke and short sleeves in stretch lace.
Fine-knit socks in a soft cotton blend with a fold-down shaft and soft terry inside. Sizes 3-9 with anti-slip protectors.
Lined triangle bikini top with moulded, lightly padded cups, a frill at the front and along the shoulder straps, and an adjustable metal hook fastening.
Sleeveless dress in soft viscose jersey with a collar, buttons at the top, an elasticated seam at the waist and gently flared skirt.

Blouse in a crêpe weave with a large flounce over one shoulder, a round neck and a yoke at the back with a button at the back of the neck. Short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups and a rounded hem with a slit at the back.
Sunglasses with plastic frames and UV-protective, tinted lenses.
Loafers in imitation leather and imitation suede with pointed toes and a decorative ball chain around the soles. Twill linings, imitation leather insoles and rubber soles. Heel approx. 3.5 cm.
Metal watch with an adjustable fastening. Diameter of face 3 cm, width of links 1.5 cm, length of bracelet 23 cm.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric made from an organic cotton blend with a lined hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

department_name: Denim wardrobe H&M man inactive from S.6
detail_desc: Shirt in premium cotton with a narrow turn-down collar, French front and yoke at the back. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slim fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.

Long dress in heavily draping jersey. Narrow cut at the top with gathers at the neckline, narrow straps that tie at the back of the neck and a cut-out section at the back. Gathered seam with a softly draping band at the waist. Unlined.
Trainers in mesh and imitation suede with a padded top edge and lacing at the front. Mesh linings and insoles and sturdy rubber soles.
Metal earrings in various designs. Ten pairs of studs, two pairs of studs with a small pendant and two pairs of hoop earrings with pendants. Size from 0.2 to 3.5 cm.
Yoga socks with anti-slip protectors on the soles. Elasticated, scalloped trim around the opening and a long elastic ribbon at the top that ties around the ankles.
Scarf in a soft weave with a brushed finish and fringe trims on the short sides. Size 60x200 cm.
Set with a T-shirt and pair of leggings in printed cotton jersey. T-shirt with an opening and button at the back of the neck and short puff sleeves. Leggings with an elasticated waist.

Chinos in stretch cotton twill with a zip fly and button, diagonal side pockets and welt back pockets with a button. Skinny Fit – a fit with slightly shorter legs that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a completely fitted silhouette.
Short, off-the-shoulder top in a crinkled weave. Short sleeves with smocking and a frill trim, decorative ties at the front and elastication around the top and hem.
All-in-one pyjamas in soft organic cotton jersey with press-studs down the front and along one leg.
Blouse in jacquard-patterned chiffon with a V-neck and ties at the top, a yoke with decorative gathers, and long sleeves with flounced cuffs. Partly lined.
Keyring with a metal carabiner hook, large, soft faux fur pompom and glittery imitation leather appliqué in the shape of a flamingo.

Shirt in washed cotton denim with a collar, press-studs down the front and a yoke at the back. Flap chest pockets with a press-stud, long sleeves, cuffs with a press-stud fastening, and a rounded hem.

Jacket in washed denim with metal buttons, a faux shearling-lined collar and buttons down the front. Flap chest pockets with a button, welt side pockets, buttoned cuffs and an adjustable tab and button at the sides. Faux shearling lining.
Top in soft sweatshirt fabric with buttons at the top, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Metal hoop earrings in various sizes and designs. Diameter from 1.5 cm to 4.5 cm.
Fine-knit trainer socks with elasticated tops.
T-shirt in patterned cotton jersey.
Short dress in woven fabric with an opening at the top and small stand-up collar with ties at the front. Long raglan sleeves, narrow cuffs, and a straight-cut hem. Unlined.

Pyjamas in lightweight sweatshirt fabric. Top with a print motif on the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Bottoms with elasticated ribbing and a concealed drawstring at the waist, pockets in the side seams and ribbed hems.
Joggers in heavy sweatshirt fabric with elasticated ribbing at the waist, side pockets and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.

Padded jacket with a padded hood, zip and press-studs down the front and drawstring at the hem. Chest pocket with a concealed zip at the top, fleece-lined pockets in the side seams and ribbed inner cuffs. Lined.
Cotton jersey T-shirt.
Double-layered triangular scarves in soft organic cotton jersey with an adjustable press-stud fastening at the back of the neck.
DESMOND & DEMPSEY x H&M. Short, V-neck dress in an airy linen and viscose weave with gathered shoulder seams, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, and a detachable tie belt at the waist. Unlined.
Bikini top with underwired, moulded, lightly padded cups, a bow at the front, ties at the back of the neck and metal fastener at the back.
Lined, triangular scarves in soft cotton jersey with an adjustable press-stud fastening at the back of the neck.
Joggers in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a washed look. Elasticated, ribbed waist, a kangaroo pocket and ribbed hems. The cotton content of the joggers is organic.

Suit trousers in a cotton weave with stretch. Concealed hook-and-eye fastener, a zip fly, side pockets, jetted back pockets and legs with creases. Skinny fit – a fit with slightly shorter legs that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a completely fitted silhouette.
Boots with an ankle-height shaft, zip in one side, lacing at the front, a loop at the back and a welt seam around the soles. Canvas linings and insoles. Heel 2 cm.

Short, off-the-shoulder dress in an airy, plumeti weave with elastication and a small frill trim at the top. Long sleeves with elastication at the cuffs, an elasticated seam at the waist and a flounce at the hem. Jersey lining.
Shirt in woven fabric with a grandad collar, button placket and chest pocket. Long sleeves with a tab and button and buttoned cuffs.
Straight-cut blouse in woven fabric. Round opening at the back with ties at the back of the neck and short, elasticated puff sleeves.
Bucket bag in grained imitation leather with two handles and a drawstring at the top and one inner compartment. Size 12x28x30 cm.
Fitted top in jersey with a V-neck, long sleeves and a covered metal ring at the front.
Fine-knit jumper in a soft viscose blend with long sleeves and wide lace trims at the cuffs and hem.
Open jacket in airy, dobby-weave viscose with dropped shoulders, wide, 3/4-length sleeves and a pompom trim at the cuffs and hem.

Classic oversized shirt in a crisp cotton weave with a collar, concealed buttons down the front and a yoke with a pleat at the back for added width. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Hipster briefs in soft jersey made from an organic cotton blend with lace trims. Low waist, lined gusset, wide sides and medium coverage at the back.
5-pocket trousers in stretch twill made from a cotton blend with an adjustable elasticated waist and zip fly with a press-stud.
Printed jersey top with short cap sleeves and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Dress in an airy, patterned cotton weave with short butterfly sleeves and buttons at the back. Gathered seam at the waist and a flared skirt. Lined at the top.
Shorts in a cotton weave with an elasticated, drawstring waist, side pockets and a fake fly.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with press-studs on one shoulder.
Short-sleeved polo shirt in cotton piqué with a ribbed collar, button placket and short slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Tops in soft jersey with narrow shoulder straps, a picot trim at the top and decorative bow at the front.
Tops in soft slub cotton jersey with short puff sleeves, concealed press-studs on one shoulder, a scalloped trim around the neckline and cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Straight-cut double-breasted jacket in a textured weave with notch lapels and flap front pockets. Lined.
Jersey-lined cargo trousers in a cotton weave with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, and flap front, back and leg pockets with a concealed press-stud.
5-pocket, calf-length jeans in washed denim with a high waist and straight legs with raw-edge, frayed hems.
Fine-knit trainer socks in a soft cotton blend with elasticated tops.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a print motif, raw, roll edges around the neckline, and short slits at the hem. Longer at the back.
Short dress in woven fabric with a smocked turtle neck and smocked yoke. Long balloon sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs.
Trousers in soft sweatshirt fabric made from an organic cotton blend with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
Tops in soft, patterned cotton jersey with a round neckline and butterfly sleeves with flatlock hems.

Short-sleeved jumpsuit in sturdy, super-narrow, ribbed jersey with a V-neck and buttons at the top. Seam at the waist with concealed elastication and a detachable tie belt, and straight, wide legs. Unlined.
T-shirt in printed cotton jersey.
